DaysToStartDeliveryProcess.Description: The time it takes (in days) for Joja to begin searching for the missing mini-harp and attempt to send it to you. 1(Spring 1), 14(Spring 14), 28(Spring 28), 56(Summer 28), 84(Fall 28), 112(Winter 28)

Crop Enchantment Overture.Description: EASY: Harvesting Hymn(1x), Solar Essence(2x), NORMAL: Harvesting Hymn(1x), Prismatic Shard(1x) - HARD: Harvesting Hymn(1x), Prismatic Shard(1x), Cinder Shard(15x) - HARDCORE: Harvesting Hymn(1x), Prismatic Shard(1x), Cinder Shard(15x) and progressive harder, requiring more prismatic and cinder shards as you craft
